overview:
Gary co-founded CPV in 1999 and helped raise venture capital funding in three separate financings for CPVâ€™s business activities, exceeding $300 million in total. Gary has overall management responsibilities for CPV’s Boston office and is a member of the Board of Directors of CPV as well as CPV Wind Ventures. Today, Gary also plays a significant role in building and directing the business activities of CPV including project development as well as the asset management business. Gary has 20 years of experience in the competitive energy industry.

Prior to CPV, Gary was a Vice President in the project development group of PG&E Generating Company, formerly US Generating Company. His responsibilities included the oversight of electric development and acquisition efforts throughout the United States.
